Reviews.Title: Get it.. you will love it!
Reviews.Author: MV
Reviews.Content: Long story short: If you doubt to get this gadget don't do it anymore.Does it work? Yes, and great,I'm 29 years old and I know about technology (different OS versions, sensitivity, resolution etc.). It does fairly everything that you want it to do. So don't worry about it. I used it like agenda/calendar, take notes, record lectures and conferences; take photos or adequate quality for on the go pics (I own a DSLR so it will be ridiculous to try to compare a photo of my camera to any phone or point and shoot camera). I tweet, listen to music and send a lot of mails, photos over the internet and use the browser a lot.Does it work with games? I'm not a gamer, but there are a lot of videos on YouTube about the phone (Star N8000) that claim that it does and well.Material quality: Excellent (there are a couple of newer versions that are made of only plastic, but are solid; this one is metal and plastic).All the things that are advertised on the box works and excellent (Wi-Fi, call-quality, cameras, Bluetooth). Radio FM is advertised to work without earphones and it does but you need them anyway to used them as antenna, so it should actually said it has speaker enable on FM radio (not that it matters a lot to me to use it). The battery does last enough, it's a huge screen so keep that in mind over the use of battery, I can go (without gaming) all day long using it without a problem.Does the size is adequate? Yes, its excellent to read books, browse the web, pictures even Netflix for on the go situations. It fits on the hand very well and in the T-Shirt front pocket. It's thin and light. However if you want a phone that is unnoticed don't choose one. (Those sizes of an iPhone are ridiculous to me if I want it to read).What about the 2nd SIM-Card Slot? I only use one most of the time, but when on call (I'm a medicine resident) I simply put the 2nd one on the slot and works perfect, however if you want to receive calls on both lines forget it, If you are talking on any of the two lines and the other got a call it will sound as busy to the other person.Apps? Its android Ice Cream Sandwich, it's great and lots of apps, I found tons of options on Google play (marketplace)  to solve any idea that I got to use my phone to.So...I used to have a more expensive phone until one got broken and other stolen. This one got everything for a better price. If you don't mind saying you got an hybrid phone (I don't) its perfect, if you mind (no one notice unless you tell them).

Reviews.Title: An OK Phone !
Reviews.Author: Nugejoy "nugejoy"
Reviews.Content: Three stars because it took a while to get to me. Don't use express shipping with this one.PROS: Android 4, 1Ghz, responsive, Bright screen, Google android market, comes with usable software/apps. Phone is not too big. Feels solid in the hands.Dual SIM easy to set up ...reception is a little weak but that may be an AT&T; issue.WiFi & Bluetooth works well.Came with an extra battery & car charger.Cons: Poor Battery Life given the size of phone. 2-3 hrs maybe with WiFi/Bluetooth and screen on lowest dim!! A big problem if you need PUSH mail for work. Battery drains quickly...need charger with U most of the time!Guess that's why the extra battery!Speakers are terrible .. need much improvement! Would have given a full 5 stars if these were better! (Analog TV is useless in USA)

Reviews.Title: Suprised
Reviews.Author: Matthew Ames "PHINC"
Reviews.Content: This is my first smart phone. I bought this one because I thought it might be worth the risk to purchase one for $160 instead of $500. So far so good, installed T Mobile's $50 sim card and everything seems to work just fineAlso, delivery was SUPER fast.

Reviews.Title: hhmmm...
Reviews.Author: a.abston
Reviews.Content: *** UPDATE! I never got internet to work properly. I never was able to send or receive MMS even though I changed the APN as was stated. ALSO, now I am NOT able to call anybody or receive a call. I do not get any service on one side of town (still inside city limits). I was so excited about this phone but after two weeks it is pretty much useless. My bf wanted to buy the same phone but I advised against it. I am waiting to hear back from the seller.I got this phone alot sooner than it was estimated at. I loved it when I saw it. It is huge, twice the size of my galaxy(regular). The screen is rather crisp and clear. It came with the two batteries (neither were charged), a USB charger, and a wall charger. The wall charger is USELESS in the states. It is a foreign charger with two large round prongs instead of the two flat prongs.It was easy to switch over to English although a thing pops up everytime I type asking me what language I want. That is really annoying. Also it highlights everything I type as mispelled when I know its not. (ex. sent text of "hope you get this" to bf and it listed all words as wrong). The internet is sssssooooooo slow. I have spent two days trying to download hotmail's app. Still nothing. The battery drains very quickly, but I have been trying to get an app so that part is questionable. The camera is definitely lacking quality. Its not terrible though. I do like that it has the rear and front facing camera. It also has a panaramic (sp?) feature which I like.The first thing I messed with on the phone was the Flashlight feature/app. I love it. My 3y/o goes crazy when I turn it on and off. The radio doesn't work unless you use the earphones that come with it as they have an antennae built in. I was able to get 2 analog tv channels (both religious)on the tv. Alot of people weren't able to use the tv. I doubt I will use it but its neat to know its there. It took me a day or so to realize there was an antennae for the tv in the bottom of the phone. I thought it was a stylus until I pulled it out. It is VERY fragile.I have a sim for Straight Talk in the phone. It shows "T-Mobile" as my carrier even though I changed the APN to StraightTalk (that was the EASIEST APN change I have ever dealt with!!!). I don't know how to fix it and am not sure if it's something I did or because of the SIM or what. I'm going to call the company when I finish this.So all-in-all my only issue is the incrediably slow internet speed. Somebody else posted about it on the page of another seller of this phone. She said she had to call t-mobile to get directions for turning on something regaurding the internet. She said that once she did that the internet speed picked up. So hopefully ST will be able to help out on that. My old samsung galaxy was constantly overheating and freezing up. The only way to fix it was to take the battery out. That started happening the first day I got it. I have had this one for 2 days now and have not had any type of issue like that. Fingers crossed.**if anybody can give me some hints/help with this phone please leave me a comment. rudeness will be reported.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Jake93
Reviews.Content: The phone is an excellent phone everything works great I love the android 4.0 Ice Cream sandwich. Plus you cannot beat the price.  The only con I can find is that the speaker and sound quality is not what you would expect the speaker phone is very quite even on the loudest volume level.  Also the camera only being 5mp does not take great quality indoor photos.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Colin
Reviews.Content: I bought it to compare to my s4 and it near the same. It is a really good replica I recommend it a lot.

Reviews.Title: Very very excellent!
Reviews.Author: Omar Ramirez Rosario
Reviews.Content: Honestly, the product was in super excellent condition, arrived on time and without difficulty, the product works really well better than I thought; I've found a few difficult but still I think the phone its great! I recommend everyone... it's an excellent phone and obviously you don't have to pay thousands dollars for a good phone!

Reviews.Title: not responsive
Reviews.Author: Fysty
Reviews.Content: within 4 days of receiving it stopped responding to touch and freezing. Also doesnt allow smooth google search and several of the android apps that i have used on other phones wont download to this phone. And every app or screen as and alternate language running beside the english version

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Thomas C. Cochran
Reviews.Content: I received my phone within the estimated delivery dates.I have only had it one day, but it already is a great phone.The screen is huge!The phone does drain the battery pretty quick during constant use, but there were two batteries included.I really like Android Jelly Bean, but this phone has Android Ice Cream Sandwich,but since it has Google Play Store, everything is A-OK.

Reviews.Title: Phone just stopped working
Reviews.Author: S.P.
Reviews.Content: First the batteries couldn't hold a charge but I thought that I could handle it.  Then the buttons and screen crapped out. Do yourself a favor, save up and buy a phone that will last five months.

Reviews.Title: i have nerver been able to use it
Reviews.Author: Suleman Nyoka Abdulai
Reviews.Content: never been able to use it for even a week. at the beginning i could not brows the net cos of constant freezing, that one i thought it was the low memory, then exactly two weeks after the screen got frozen can't even unlock the screen has become insensitive.

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: JACKIE LOGWOOD
Reviews.Content: took me awhile to understand everything with this phone.  I love it plenty of memory big writing can do more with this phone than i thought possible

Reviews.Title: poor quality equipment
Reviews.Author: Danny Welch
Reviews.Content: the screen appeared to have vertical lines making it hard to view anything in detail.the screen protectors and silicone case that I ordered as recommended by amazon were for a galaxy note and did not fit the unit.after less than 1 month the screen went all white, no icons or controls available. completely unusable.  A huge waste of money,

Reviews.Title: Good phone for the price
Reviews.Author: isaemm
Reviews.Content: This phone is pretty good for the price you pay. It needs more memory for apps and a faster processor. It lags sometimes when switching in and out of difference apps, but is tolerable. The screen is big and very decent. I would recommend this phone as an alternate if you are in between upgrades and need something to hold you over.

Reviews.Title: Good mobile
Reviews.Author: Mawaheb Ali Mohd
Reviews.Content: I like this mobile, I got two pieces for me and my husband and we both like it so much. It is simple to use with a lot of features. The only thing about it is that the WiFi is not strong enough.

Reviews.Title: greatness has arrived
Reviews.Author: union baptist church
Reviews.Content: the camera is a little suckish but its no big deal just change the settings to match your light.  nice screen size.  Also works with straight talk. If your inernet is not working just set up your apn.  Everything elso was great. product as described.

Reviews.Title: Very good phone!
Reviews.Author: Zviad S.
Reviews.Content: Very good phone! Good and beautiful designs, varied functions work well, battery stay 24 hours, a large screen with the best colors! Recommended by 100%

Reviews.Title: Pay for what you get
Reviews.Author: Henry Akpala
Reviews.Content: I got a phone that was used but packaged as new.  The charger doesn't fit properly and the battery does not last at all.  Outside of that it works ok.

Reviews.Title: Great Value For Price!!
Reviews.Author: SBMH20
Reviews.Content: I was sceptical at first because this is not a brand name. But I am so happy I took the chance and order this. This is a great phone. My phone came with android 4.1.1, very fast response time. Takes no time at all when I swipe from screen to screen.  I have Walmart Family Mobile. This is my first time using a sim card very easy. All I did was buy sim card from walmart and activate on walmart family mobile and put it in the phone. The phone immediatley recoginezed it. It gives you an option to choose what features you want such as voice and data. I always turn my data off when Im using my wifi, so I can save my data for when I need it. I would defintley recommened to purchased a micro Sd card with this phone. It comes with storage but after downloaing 6 apps and some music it was low on memory. One thing I don't like is netflix doesn't work. You can download app but you can't stream. This is known issue with netflix not phone. Netflix only works on some phones samsung galaxy HTC EVO 4g. I love watching movies so I download movie tube and watch alot of movies for free. The battery life is what you would except for a smartphone users who plays games searches web and use gps. My phone fully charged last about 12 hrs with about half that time on standby and the rest using it for searching web and playing games and making calls. The camera on this phone is ok not better than HTC EVO 4g. Camcorder is horrible it alwasys shows dark even with light on. Maybe I have a setting wrong. I haven't had too much time to mess with. But I will update if I can figure that out.This phones includes:* 2 batteries*USb Wall charger ( American outlet order from US Seller)* Usb cable* Phone case for back* Screen protector already installed on phone* Headphones with mic ( they are very uncomfortable, I would recommened Skullcandy)* ManuelAlso I forgot to mentionthis phone has a Flashlight. Speakers are ok not loud enough to play music from too far. wifi Is very good never have issues.If you have any questions about this phone just reply to this post.

Reviews.Title: Nice purchase worth the price
Reviews.Author: James Talley
Reviews.Content: All aspects are good. I have yet to find a Radio station with it, however!I have not found a good case either.I would recommend!!

Reviews.Title: excellent phone
Reviews.Author: G. IVEY "juney"
Reviews.Content: my stepson loves it im thinking about getting me one its a really good phone just like a galaxy note

Reviews.Title: MTK6575
Reviews.Author: JULIO CESAR ORTA
Reviews.Content: EXCELLENT SMARTPHONE, VERY APPLICATIONS ARE EASY, THE NAVEGATION IS GOOD, AS THE APP STORE, GPS ITS EXACTLY VERY GOO I RECOMENDED ITS SMART PHONE

Reviews.Title: Not Good
Reviews.Author: CK
Reviews.Content: Not a true 3G , will NOT connect to 3G networks in the US , since the WDMA 2100 is the only 3G and ATT uses a different frequencies 850 .. so don't expect a fast data connection if any .. other than that decent phone for the money ,

Reviews.Title: Internet does not work!
Reviews.Author: Audrey Morris
Reviews.Content: I am unable to receive my data package on this phone, after trying everything up under the sun, even my phone company could not figure it out. Even if I could get data to work it would only be EDGE, because of the frequency on the phone. If you want this phone for text, call and data I would not recommend. Also, the camera is not very good quality. I wish I would have spent my money on a different phone that was fully functioned.

Reviews.Title: not my favorite purchase. not my favorite purchase.  you get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: LadyP
Reviews.Content: Its slow and not very user friendly. Its slow and not very user friendly. This review word count is stupid.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Rey
Reviews.Content: So far excellent phone . Have all the capabilities as the Galaxy Note. Highly recommend it to anyone needed a inexpensible phone.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Joseph F. Maalouf
Reviews.Content: This phone exceeded my expectations, it is fast easy to use. it has all that I needed and much more. Thanks for the recommendation.

Reviews.Title: THIS DEVICE SUCKED
Reviews.Author: ruby leff
Reviews.Content: as soon as i got it the thing bootlooped and failed my excpectations completly. i hated this product alot. dont buy

Reviews.Content: No recibi el producto. Fue confiscado por el gobierno. Quiero la devolucion del dinero o el producto5.0inch 3G Android 4.0 MTK6575 1.0GHz Dual SIM Quadband Capacitive Screen Smartphone with WiFi GPS TV+back case
